data.title: meaning of 576I AND 576P in SUN
data.meta_description: What  is  the  use  of a 576I  and 576P  Menu ->TVoutput ->componant -> 576I   (or)Menu ->TVoutput -> componant -> 576p  what happens  when  we use 576I ...
data.text:
576i - Interlaced scanning (Interlace - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia)

576p - Progressive scanning (Progressive scan - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia)

These are different method how picture is drawn/displayed on our TV screen. Most TV's support only Interlaced scanning. But LCD/Plasma screens support both.

Progressive gives better picture quality

Hello SVK, thanks for that information.

But I also faced differences in the usage.

For e.g., I have have a favorite with UTV and NDTV.

In 576i -> I chose UTV thro' favorites. After 5 min, I press the down button, I get NDTV ( within the favorites )

In 576p -> I chose UTV tho' favorites. After info menu disappears, I press the down button. I get some other channel as the mode is already switched from "favorite" to "TV"

I tested this several times with same results. Did anybody else experience such differences???

Strange!

Actually FAV channel list & 'Display Option' are independent, don't know why it is happening

Fren this happened to me in 576i as well. I Called and asked CC people... He replied that 'favourite option is not yet available and you hav to wait for somemore time':dance::cool2:
